work.title: Software Engineering Manager
description: Led the mobile app profile section redesigning effort, collaborating with multiple organizations to ensure successful approval
Efficiently manage the web and mobile platform for Upgrades & Subscriptions, Leasing, and Vehicle Ownership, ensuring seamless customer experiences and revenue growth
Collaborate with Product to craft and refine quarterly roadmaps, aligning both business and engineering priorities
Coordinate with various team leads and QA Engineers to orchestrate weekly production code deployments, enhancing product delivery and reliability
Continuously assess product updates with design and product teams to ensure achievable outcomes, resulting in higher-quality releases and improved user satisfaction
Successfully implemented a QR-code-based auto sign-in webpage for Hertz rental customers, simplifying the customer experience and increasing efficiency

Streamlined the mobile app by architecting a web-based customizable splash and guest page, reducing deployment time and simplifying content management, saving valuable time for both Engineering and Product teams

Empower QA and engineering teams to prioritize and maintain automation testing, leading to increased efficiency and reduced overtime for QA in weekly regression testing, improving resource allocation and product quality

Manage and actively mentored the professional development of software engineers on my team, guiding their career progression from associate level to senior level, resulting in a skilled and motivated workforce
Responsible for on-call duties during and after business hours to minimize customer impact during outages, ensuring uninterrupted service and customer satisfaction
Regularly assess pod health to proactively prepare for and respond to spikes in traffic, improving system resilience and customer experience
Foster collaboration with the support team to promptly address and resolve customer complaints and issues on both web and mobile platforms, enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty

Successfully spearheaded the seamless transition of multiple product lines from the web platform to the mobile app, skillfully guiding the team to excel with React Native, expanding the company's digital footprint and customer reach

work.title: Staff Software Engineer
description: Implemented a data-driven approach to streamline UI logic, significantly reducing time-to-market for new products and enhancing product competitiveness
Supervised a team of 9 Software Engineers and 4 QA Engineers, ensuring consistent efficient project delivery and product quality
Collaborated with the vehicle division to introduce in-car purchase of software upgrades and subscriptions, generating additional revenue streams
Conducted interviews and hired engineers and QA specialists at various experience levels (Associate to Senior), bolstering the team's capabilities and productivity
Advocated for the adoption of WCAG 2.1 standards and worked with Product and Design to meet them, improving accessibility and expanding the user base
Orchestrated daily scrum stand-up meetings and coordinated story time sessions for engineers across multiple product lines, boosting team collaboration and productivity
Collaborated with multiple departments to successfully launch the Captive Leasing and Ownership Transfer web platform, enabling new business opportunities
Led the migration of the legacy web stack from Drupal PHP & JavaScript to Node & ReactJS, improving performance and scalability
Launched Premium Connectivity via the web platform, establishing a foundation for future vehicle subscription services and enhancing revenue
Managed and navigated a company-wide Reduction in Force (RIF) with transparent communication and compassionate support, minimizing disruption and maintaining employee morale

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Enhanced webpages by implementing the Cybertruck CSS theme and providing essential support for a successful livestream event, boosting brand engagement
Pioneered the development of the initial Tesla Insurance web platform, enabling the company to offer a new product to customers and expand its market presence
Architected a versatile PHP boilerplate burst-app using Slim, empowering multiple teams to rapidly develop and extend applications, increasing development efficiency
Developed and maintained the Model Y livestream sign-up and event page, enhancing customer engagement and interaction, leading to increased interest and brand loyalty
Advocated for and implemented design patterns that standardized coding practices for CSS and JavaScript, resulting in improved code quality and maintainability
Contributed valuable insights and feedback through code reviews, ensuring high-quality code and reducing the likelihood of post-release issues
Rapidly designed and built the Tesla Semi and Roadster reservation web pages before a global unveiling, creating excitement and anticipation in the market
Developed an Angular-based app to streamline translation processes, accelerating global expansion and product localization efforts
Crafted the Solar Roof marketing and reservation page, facilitating product launch, attracting potential customers, and driving sales
Successfully integrated SolarCity's development environment into Tesla's, harmonizing processes and improving overall efficiency
Updated the Tesla Powerwall configurator, streamlining the order-taking process and increasing sales for this product line

work.title: UI Developer
description: Worked as a consultant to Bloomingdale's to redesign the 'Sign In' and 'Profile Page' section of the store website, enhancing user experience and engagement using a Lean Lab approach
Transformed JavaScript & JSP-based web pages into responsive designs using Backbone and Marionette, resulting in improved accessibility across devices and higher customer satisfaction
Revamped web page layout and design by leveraging Handlebars, SCSS, and the Foundation framework, leading to a more visually appealing and user-friendly website

Actively participated in scrum meetings with stakeholders, ensuring informed decision-making and alignment with the company's value-per-feature approach, which facilitated more efficient product development and delivery

work.title: Mobile Developer
description: Spearheaded company-wide initiative to implement an AngularJS and Bootstrap based design framework to achieve a unified look and feel for webapps, resulting in a united and user-friendly online experience, strengthening brand image and user satisfaction
Assumed responsibility for interviewing, hiring, managing, and mentoring university interns, fostering a talent, and supporting professional growth of emerging developers
Executed a comprehensive redesign of existing AJAX-based web pages using an in-house Angular framework, optimizing user experience, and streamlining content delivery
Pioneered the development of a cross-platform mobile push notification system for iOS and Android, seamlessly integrated with Passbook distribution, enhancing communication and customer engagement
Designed and developed a real-time web app for rendering and modifying Passbooks, improving user convenience and interaction
Created a Jenkins build-server monitoring app that displays analytics and statistics of unit test results using AngularJS and D3, enhancing development efficiency and quality
Developed the 'Genesys Care' iOS and Android application, empowering customers to monitor and manage customer support tickets, leading to increased customer satisfaction and loyalty

Collaboratively created the Genesys SaaS Agent Monitoring web app in a TDD style, featuring Jasmine unit tests and continuous integration with Jenkins build servers, ensuring high-quality and reliable software
Designed an application for logging into websites based on credentials stored on NFC chips, simplifying and securing user access to online platforms

Demonstrated expertise and enthusiasm for NFC technology by delivering company-wide presentations on its use cases and technical specifications, fostering awareness and understanding across the organization

work.title: Mobile Developer
description: Created the NexTaxi Android application, providing users with a user-friendly platform to reserve and track their taxicabs, resulting in improved customer satisfaction and engagement Additionally, seamless integration with the 'TranAir' application streamlined in-app payments, enhancing convenience and efficiency

Led the development of Universal TranWare's 'TranAir' Android tablet application, empowering taxicab operators to communicate with the dispatch system efficiently through middleware and conduct secure credit card transactions using Moneris APIs with a Bluetooth POS printer The incorporation of turn-by-turn navigation and push-to-talk to dispatch within the application, leveraging Google APIs, improved operational efficiency and customer service

Presented and demonstrated the application's features and functionality at the annual Taxi, Limousine & Para-transit Association exhibition in San Francisco, showcasing the innovation and technological advancements to a wide audience, generating interest and potential business opportunities

education.area: B.Sc. in Astrophysics and Physics, and Computer Science

personalSkills: Effective & cooperative team lead, yet productive as an independent worker
Thrives under immense pressure and tight deadlines
Enthusiastic to stay up-to-date and learn new skills
Persistent on the successful completion of a given task
